participant_1.background:
I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
I need to find a way to balance my love of binge watching with my need to focus on my art.
I made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits and I'm proud of my progress.
I live in the suburbs, but my dream is to live on Mars.
i love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my back yard.

participant_2.background:
My father is a big influence in my life, even if we don't see eye to eye.
I get along with my family, but they don't understand my collection.
i don t like my reputation.
i am currently looking for a job.
i am fairly conservative in politics.

content.text: Pretty good! Just working on some art, trying to figure out how to balance it with my binge watching habits.
I get that! Do you have a favorite show that you're watching right now?
I'm really enjoying the new season of Stranger Things.
Oh, I haven't started watching that yet! I've heard good things about it.
It's really good! I'm also watching a lot of anime.
I've never really watched anime before. What's your favorite?
Right now, I'm really into Attack on Titan. It's really dark and violent, but it's also really good.
That sounds interesting! I might have to check it out.
I think you would like it!
Do you have any other hobbies besides binge watching and art?
I write stories! I love to sit in my backyard and write.
That's awesome! Do you ever publish your stories?
Not yet, but I'm working on it!
Well, I hope you keep up the good work! I'm sure your stories are great.
